faq.title: What is streamPlay
faq.content: streamPlay is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

faq.title: how much does streamPlay cost
faq.content: Watch streamPlay on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from $6.99 to $19.99 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.

faq.title: where can I watch streamPlay
faq.content: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your streamPlay account to watch instantly on the web at streamPlay.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the streamPlay app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles. You can also download your favorite shows with the iOS, Android, or Windows 10 app. Use downloads to watch while you

faq.title: How do I cancel streamPlay
faq.content: streamPlay is flexible. There are no pesky contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.
